name: Corona at the Mall
description:
Your mission, should you choose to accept it, is to find and retrieve high valued items.

Or something like that because grandma needs some stuff.

This game was submitted for the GMTK game jam 2020. An "Out of Control" virus fit the theme nicely. (Not to mention the out of control karens we got hidden around the place too)

Walk around using WASD and interact with items and the shopkeeper using E. zoom in/out with mouse scroll. Shift to shuffle a lil faster.

Big thanks to Trixerp for creating all of the sprites used in this game

ps. Look for the karens to find what you desire

Know issues/Quality fixes: (This might get fixed once the game jam is over)

- Game failes to stop when character comes to a complete stop

- Player should run faster

- Control legend in menu
